title: Global leading countries in wine export 2018 , based on volume
summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in million hectoliters in each Country on the y axis.
The maximum Export volume in million hectoliters 21.0 is found at Country Spain and the minimum is found at New Zealand where Country is 2.6.
The maximum Country Spain has got 8.08 times higher Export volume in million hectoliters than the minimum Country New Zealand.
min_summary: This bar chart has 11 columns on the x axis representing Country, and Export volume in million hectoliters in each Country on the y axis.
Country Spain has the highest Export volume in million hectoliters and New Zealand has the lowest Export volume in million hectoliters.

max_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Export volume in million hectoliters for 11 number of Countrys.
The maximum Export volume in million hectoliters 21.0 is found at Country Spain and the minimum is found at New Zealand where Country is 2.6.
The second highest Export volume in million hectoliters is appeared to be the Country Italy.
The highest Country Spain has 18.4 more Export volume in million hectoliters than the lowest Country New Zealand.
Export volume in million hectoliters at Country Spain is 21.0 , second place is Italy at 19.7, and thirdly is France at 14.1.
The Country Spain tends to be 2.49 percent higher than average.
